message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% of the money upfront.
Considering the depreciation, I think 45% is a fair share for me.
Bob, this is my final offer.  Accept this and we both avoid further losses from the declining value.
Considering the increased depreciation, I believe I deserve an even larger share.
Bob, it's clear we're both losing out by dragging this on. Let's settle this now. This is the same amount you offered me last round, which I'm willing to accept considering the circumstances.
I'm willing to make one last proposal. Considering the significant depreciation, I believe this is a fair share for both of us.
